review_blob: Nice, fresh tasting Kolsch style.  Not hoppy, has a slightly citrus and herb flavor. Goes down easy, but has more substance than Bud, etc...

Was one of my favs in mid 90s. However something changed.  Either me or the recipe. The color is a nice dark amber and while it starts with really smooth taste, it ends with a really bad burnt taste. I still drink this frequently, but just one or two at a sitting due to the burnt taste.

Draft: Buffalo Wild Wings of all places. Instantly reminded me of Germany.  Good banana and vanilla nose. A little sweet, with nice undertone of spice. Very refreshing to start, finishes a little dry and bitter.
